author: coupdegrace

comments.content: 'Gourmand Grotesk', bespoke and exclusive for 'The Gourmand'. Reminds me a bit of [Monotype Grotesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132243/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/grotesque-mt).

Confirmed. New cut of Monotype Grotesque by Gunnar Vilhjálmsson  
 [https://twitter.com/Monotype/status/540844573929775104](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132243/https:/twitter.com/Monotype/status/540844573929775104 "https://twitter.com/Monotype/status/540844573929775104")

> We’re spending our Friday browsing the new @Gourmand site, and admiring their very special new ampersand

[http://twitter.com/monotype/status/539730043279507457](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132243/http:/twitter.com/monotype/status/539730043279507457 "http://twitter.com/monotype/status/539730043279507457")

> We worked with The @Gourmand on a new cut of Monotype Grotesque, for their latest issue

[http://magculture.com/blog/out-now-the-gourmand-5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132243/http:/magculture.com/blog/out-now-the-gourmand-5 "http://magculture.com/blog/out-now-the-gourmand-5")

> Creative director David Lane has been working with Monotype to resurrect early versions of their Monotype Grotesque typeface.
